management.title: User Management
management.description: View all users and manage roles (use search to filter)
management.searchPlaceholder: Enter username or email to filter...
management.minSearchLength: Please enter at least 2 characters to search
management.searchFailedRetry: Search failed. Please try again later.
management.updateFailedRetry: Update failed. Please try again later.
management.confirmRoleChangeMessage: Are you sure you want to change {{username}}'s role from {{oldRole}} to {{newRole}}?
management.adminPermissionNote: After setting as admin, this user will have full system management permissions.
management.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete user {{email}}?
management.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone! All user data will be permanently deleted.
management.deleteError: An error occurred while deleting user

announcement.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the announcement "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

environment.title: Environment Management
environment.subtitle: Manage database connections and sync operations
environment.syncDescription: Sync data from one database to another. Migrations will be applied automatically. Note: This will overwrite the target database.
environment.needBothConnected: Both databases need to be connected to sync
environment.confirmSwitch:
Data will be synced from {{source}} to {{target}} before switching.

(Database migrations will be applied automatically)

Continue?
environment.confirmSync:
Are you sure you want to sync data from {{source}} to {{target}}?

(Database migrations will be applied automatically)

This will overwrite the target database.
